tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: SELECT distinct datetime(endtime,"HH:mm","2m"), CONDITION(count(*), WHERE ((useraction.application="Gogo Inflight Production" and useraction.name="ifc/splash"))) AS "Splash", CONDITION(count(*), WHERE ((useraction.application="Gogo Inflight Production" and useraction.name="ifc/splash")) and ((useraction.application="Gogo Inflight Production" and useraction.name="activate"))) AS "Activate" from usersession where useraction.application in ("Gogo Inflight Production")  ${uspClause}
